  #include <iostream>
    using namespace std;
     
    int main()
    {
    int a, counterX = 0, counterY = 0, b = 0, c;
    cin >> a;
     
     for(int x = 0; x < a; x++)
    {
    cin >> c;
     if(c%2 == 0)
      counterX++;
     else
      counterY++;
    }
    b = counterY - counterX;
     if (b < 0)
     {
    b = b * -1;
      cout << b << endl;
     }
     
     else
      cout << b << endl;
    return 0;
    }
